full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL MGON DON LNGA'I GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL LEGS TSOGS LHUN GRUB BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(ZHES DPAL MGON DON LNGA'I GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL LEGS TSOGS LHUN GRUB ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RTZOD PA'I DUS KYIS THA MA'I BDAG CAG SEMS CAN RNAMS LA, MI DANG MIN GYI GNOD PA CHAR LTAR 'BABS PA'I DUS 'DI LA, RANG GZHAN KUN PHAN PA DANG, KHYAD PAR RIGS RUS SHING DU MTHO ZHING PHUN TSOGS PA DANG PA DANG, DAM TSIG GTZANG MA RNAMS DPYOD PHA DAM PA THU SHE YE GUNG KHUN DI LING DUR GI CHE RIN CHEN RDO RJE DONG GRUB, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG DZ'O NA MING GIS BRIS SO BGRAN 'GRONGS YONGS LA 'PHAN 'DOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
